amendment.description: An amendment numbered 40 printed in House Report 115-259 to cut $921 million from the Department of Energy nuclear weapons activities account and add $921 million to the Office of Energy Efficiency & Renewable Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A024) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Quigley amendment (A024) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A024) offered by Mr. Quigley.
